message.raw:
Log to <labscript_suite>/logs instead of individual program directories

This will assist the move to regular Python packages, where it doesn't make a
lot of sense to log to python/lib/site-packages.

Tell zprocess servers to log to the same directory, and require the version
of zprocess that introduces that option.

message:
